description: Marks an entity as an anatomy body part with a specific subtype

subType.description: The specific type of body part (e.g., 'leg', 'arm', 'breast', 'head')

orientation.description: The orientation of the body part inherited from parent socket (e.g., 'left', 'right', 'mid', or indexed like '1', '2')

hit_probability_weight.description: Relative weight for being hit in a general attack (e.g., torso > finger)
